scripts.build-all: sh -c 'cd "$PWD" && echo "🧹 Cleaning..." && rm -rf npm && echo "🏗️  Building..." && deno run -A _build_npm.ts && echo "📦 Installing dependencies..." && cd test-app && pnpm install && echo "🔗 Linking package..." && pnpm link ../npm && echo "✅ Done!"'
scripts.prepare-publish: sh -c 'cd "$PWD" && echo "🧹 Cleaning..." && rm -rf npm && echo "🏗️  Building..." && deno run -A _build_npm.ts && echo "📦 Publishing to npm..." && cd npm && pnpm publish --access public && echo "✅ Published!"'
